sentences.en: A 20 - year old tree could produce 3000 - 4000 pairs of chopstick.
sentences.cn: 一棵生长了20年的大树,仅能制成3000至4000双筷子.

sentences.en: Could you pass me the chopstick ( knife, fork, napkin )?
sentences.cn: 可以将筷子 ( 稻子, 叉子, 餐巾 )?

sentences.en: Do you know what is a disposable chopstick made of?
sentences.cn: 你知道你每餐用的一次性筷子是怎么做的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Easy to break one chopstick, 10 chopsticks holds together.
sentences.cn: 一根筷子容易断，10根筷子握在一起。

sentences.en: He put the chopstick and watched as the bee dried out.
sentences.cn: 他放下筷子,看着蜜蜂(弄干身体).

sentences.en: How well do you know your chopstick etiquette?
sentences.cn: 对于这些关于筷子的礼仪，你知道多少呢？
我要筷子 、 刀 、 叉.

sentences.en: I put down my chopstick, the half eaten pork chop left cold on the plate.
sentences.cn: 我放下我的筷子，被我吃了一半的排骨躺在盘子上变凉了。

sentences.en: It's rude to point your chopstick at others.
sentences.cn: 用筷子指着别人是不礼貌的.

sentences.en: Move the top chopstick to pick up food.
sentences.cn: 挪动两根筷子下方就可夹起食物.

sentences.en: My father progged the top of the loaves with a chopstick.
sentences.cn: 我父亲用一只筷子戳刺面包的顶部

sentences.en: Only the chopstick on the left should move.
sentences.cn: 只要动左边的筷子就行.

sentences.en: Rest the left chopstick on the finger and the finger.
sentences.cn: 把左边的筷子放在小指与无名指上.

sentences.en: Rest the right chopstick on the ring finger.
sentences.cn: 把右边的筷子靠在无名指上.

sentences.en: The chopstick I poked your arm with is on the floor.
sentences.cn: 直译:我戳你的那根筷子现在在地板上.

sentences.en: The way they made Jade Chopstick Soup was very cruel.
sentences.cn: 制作玉柱汤的方法非常残忍.

sentences.en: There are ten pairs of chopsticks in our chopstick case.
sentences.cn: 我家的筷笼里放了十双筷子.

sentences.en: What do you have in your bag: chopstick, books, CD - player.
sentences.cn: 你的包包里面有些什么: 筷子 、 书 、 CD随身听.

trans.tran_en: one of the two thin sticks that you use to eat food in many countries in Asia
